text: 1:17 Habakuk 2:4; Jon 3:36; Rom 3:21-22; Galesia 3:11; Hibru 10:38Akar Aghuir kam, an arazir aghuir God amizir kamɨn e dɨpon suam, e an damazimɨn dera. Ezɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn tuavimra e an damazimɨn gumazamizir aghuibar otogham. Mati akam Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn iti, “Gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itiba, God me mɨkɨm suam, me nan damazimɨn dera, eghtɨ gumazamizir kaba zurara deraghvɨra ikiam.”
